description:
Ushio and Tora leave Touno and head to Hokkaido once again, but they`re attacked repeatedly on the way by Youkai.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Combat contre les Yôkai de Tôno, 1re partie
Der Weg zum Kampf mit den Dämonen von Tono Teil 1
The Road to the Touno Youkai Battle: Part One
Toono Youkai Ikusa Michiyuki: Sono Ichi
遠野妖怪戦道行~其の壱~
